markdownRemark.html:
Don’t put off joy while waiting for what’s next. There are no perfect conditions.

There’s so much out of our control and no sense hinging joy on uncontrollable. There’s something good in everything. Work to find the joy in the present.

frontmatter.description: There's so much out of our control and no sense hinging joy on uncontrollable. There's something good in everything. Work to find the joy in the present.
frontmatter.title: find joy in the present, there are no perfect conditions
